item.description:
Dear Boston Karaoke Meetup Members:

We had a wonderful Meetup in June with 17 members and we sang 2-3 songs each.  I am so pleased that we have regular attendees like Mark K., Mike T., Randall, Lisa, Alex G., Judi, Ramon etc. It was also great to have newer members like Vicki, Paul, Melissa, Karen, Karin, Alex, etc.  Thanks so much to you all for supporting the group.

I received input from members who asked that I continue through the summer, so I am planning to do that.

I am pleased to announce another Boston Karaoke Meetup! It's at the Courtside Restaurant and Pub in Cambridge MA again. Courtside has an excellent selection of over 70,000 songs and many large screens for viewing lyrics. Whatever kind of music you enjoy, there will be something for you.

We have the Karaoke Lounge reserved just for us from 6-9PM so please try to get there by 6PM to get the most out of this Meetup.

Space is limited so please sign up as soon as possible.

Regards,
-Phil
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the back with the Karaoke machine or call me at 617-429-6571
item.name: Boston Karaoke Meetup - July 2011 - starts at 6PM
